entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening then clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
